desc.en: The city is located on a peninsula in the northeastern part of a fictional country. It is the capital of the country. The rail transit system consists of two parts: Sopourin Metro and Sopourin Suburban Railway.
desc.zh: 这座城市坐落于一个架空国家东北部的半岛上，是国家的首都。轨道交通系统由两部分组成：斯巴林地铁和斯巴林市郊铁路。

reference: 爱发电,Thu Jun 26 2025 01:53:46 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
